mapper.select: select *from (select ROWNUM RN, users.*from (select rownum, user_id userId, user_pwd userPwd, user_name userName, user_email userEmail, user_tel userTel, user_addr userAddr, user_birth userBirth, user_reg userReg,user_class userClass, user_status userStatus from users) users)users where RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*)from users where to_char(user_reg) = to_char(sysdate)

select user_id userId, user_pwd userPwd, user_name userName, user_email userEmail, user_tel userTel, user_addr userAddr, user_birth userBirth, user_reg userReg, user_class userClass, user_status userStatus from users where user_id = #{userId}
select user_id userId, user_email userEmail from users where user_email = #{userEmail}

select user_id userId, user_pwd userPwd, user_name userName, user_email userEmail, user_tel userTel, user_addr userAddr, user_birth userBirth, user_reg userReg, user_class userClass, user_status userStatus from users where user_id =#{userId} and user_pwd=#{userPwd} and user_status != 'D'
mapper.update: update users set user_pwd= #{userPwd}, user_email=#{userEmail}, user_tel=#{userTel}, user_addr=#{userAddr} where user_id =#{userId}
update users set user_status = 'D' where user_id =#{userId}
